paramedic.title: A Paramedic After a Chaotic Shift
messages: It was really busy, non-stop calls.
Yeah, we had a serious accident case that was tough.
Not really, we were too busy.
I listen to music on the way home.
Yeah, I put on a playlist after my shift.
No, I think I'm okay now.
Thanks.

doctor.title: A Doctor Handling a Difficult Case
messages: Really busy, some difficult cases.
Yeah, I had a difficult conversation with a patient.
Briefly, but we had to move on quickly.
I try to leave work at work, but sometimes it sticks with me.
Yeah, I'll try to reset later.
No, I think I'm good.
Thanks, will do!

nurse.title: A Nurse After an Overwhelming Shift
messages: It's been a rough shift, we're understaffed.
Too many patients, not enough time.
Not really, I barely had time to eat.
I try to take a short walk when I can.
Yeah, for a few minutes.
No, I just need some sleep.
Thanks.

student.title: STUDENT / JUNIOR DOCTOR
messages: It's been tough, I'm struggling to keep up with both.
Both, but especially revision. I just don't have enough time.
Not really, I feel guilty when I'm not studying.
I try to set timers to break revision into chunks, but I still feel behind.
Yeah, my friends are feeling the same, we try to keep each other motivated.
No, I think I just need to push through this week.
Thanks, I'll try!
